Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Zhǔ céng wèi nǐmen chuàngzào ěrmù hé xīn, nǐmen de gǎnxiè shì hěn shǎo de
Tā céng shǐ nǐmen zài dàdìshàng fánzhí, nǐmen yào bèi jíhé zài tā nàlǐ
tā shǐ sǐ wù shēng, shǐ shēngwù sǐ, zhòuyè de gēngdié yóu tā zhǔchí. Nándào nǐmen bù liǎojiě ma
Bùrán, tāmen shuō liǎo rú gǔrén suǒ shuō dehuà
tāmen shuō:“Wǒmen sǐ hòu, yǐ biàn chéng chén'āi hé xiǔ gǔ de shíhòu, nándào wǒmen hái bìdìng yào fùhuó ma
Wǒmen hé wǒmen de zǔxiān, yǐqián què yǐ shòuguò zhè zhǒng jǐnggàole. Zhè gè zhǐshì gǔrén de shénhuà.”
Nǐ shuō:“Dà dì hé qízhōng de rénwù, jiùjìng shì wèi shéi suǒyǒu? Rúguǒ nǐmen zhīdào.”
Tāmen yào shuō:“Wéi zhēnzhǔ suǒyǒu.” Nǐ shuō:“Nǐmen zěn bù jìdé ne?”
Nǐ shuō:“Shéi shì qītiān de zhǔ hé wěidà de bǎozuò de zhǔ ne?”
Tāmen yào shuō:“Zhēnzhǔ.” Nǐ shuō:“Nà nǐmen zěn bù jìngwèi ne?”
Nǐ shuō:“Wànwù de zhǔquán, zài shéi de zhǎngwò zhī zhōng? Shéi néng bǎohù zhòngshēng, ér tā zìjǐ bù shòu bǎohù ne? Rúguǒ nǐmen zhīdào.”
Tāmen yào shuō:“Shì zhēnzhǔ.” Nǐ shuō:“Nǐmen zěnme bèi rén míhuò ne?”
Bùrán, wǒ yǐ zhēnlǐ zhāoshì tāmen, ér tāmen què shì shuōhuǎng de

Zhēnzhǔ méiyǒu shōuyǎng rènhé érzi, yě méiyǒu rènhé shénlíng yǔ tā tóngděng; fǒuzé měi gè shénlíng bì dúzhàn tāsuǒ chuàngzào zhě, tāmen yě bì yōushèng liè bài. Zànsòng zhēnzhǔ, chāo hū tāmen de miáoshù
zànsòng quánzhī yōumíng de zhǔ, chāo hū tāmen de miáoshù, chāo hū tāmen suǒyòng lái pèi tā de (yīqiè dōngxī)
